ModMetaData.name: Quick Terrain Brush Tool
ModMetaData.author: ProgrammerLily
ModMetaData.description:
Adds five developer brush tools to the Dev Palette that apply terrain in square areas of fixed size (4×4, 8×8, 16×16, 32×32, 64×64).
This mod extends the existing terrain rectangle tool with preset square brushes centered on the clicked tile. Perfect for rapid terrain prototyping and map design.
Features: • Five brush sizes: 4x4, 8x8, 16x16, 32x32, 64x64 • Reuses existing terrain selection UI • Cached terrain selection across brush sizes • Visual brush preview under mouse cursor • Integrated into Dev Palette under "Terrain" category
Usage: 1. Open the Debug Menu (Development mode required) 2. Navigate to Terrain category 3. Select desired brush size 4. Choose terrain type (cached for subsequent uses) 5. Click on map to paint terrain
The terrain selection is remembered across all brush sizes until cleared or changed, making it easy to paint with different sizes using the same terrain type.
